Texts.Eng: Agitated. We are besieged by another wave! They've sent more infantry, and more archers, and... No! They're in the skies! Those purple curs have taken to the air!
Cautious. Is it gone? Are you intact? If it's gone I need to talk to you.
Desperate. Not another ballista! Save the keep! I haven't even uncovered its greatest secrets yet!
Hello? It's me. I'm sorry but - there are more cultists coming. Please don't worry though; we're going to help! I'd just get in the way, but the others are coming down!
Jubilant. Ha ha! That's done for them! We got every last one of those wretched maggots! I could sing! Come here, I want to speak to you...
Outraged.The brigands have rolled in a war machine! I won't have my keep obliterated, you must destroy that ballista! I won't lose my collection or my research!
Panicked. The ballista! And Mega-Fauna! My beautiful walls! And my ^green;artifacts^reset;! Protect my beautiful ^green;artifacts^reset;!
You again? Why do you oppose us? Your mind is wasted with ^red;them^reset;. No matter. Oppose us, and die with the rest. ^red;BARON! WE'RE HERE FOR THE ^orange;ARTIFACT^reset;! HAND IT OVER!^reset;
You will not stop the ^red;Awakening^reset; no matter how hard you try. With or without the artifact, it is inevitable. We'll meet again, you fool! And next time, you will die.
